block.p: POTLATCH CORP., Spokane, Wash., a producer of paper and lumber, said it would shut a plywood plant in Jaype, Idaho, and dismiss 215 workers because of falling plywood prices.
CONAGRA INC., Omaha, completed its acquisition of International Home Foods, the maker of Chef Boyardee pasta and other products.
POTLATCH CORP., Spokane, Wash., a producer of paper and lumber, said it would shut a plywood plant in Jaype, Idaho, and dismiss 215 workers because of falling plywood prices.
CONAGRA INC., Omaha, completed its acquisition of International Home Foods, the maker of Chef Boyardee pasta and other products.

FASTSHIP INC., Philadelphia, an operator of shipping networks, said it would acquire a portion of a railyard and dormant shipping terminal from ConRail so it could build a new terminal in Philadelphia.
REYNOLDS & REYNOLDS CO., Dayton, Ohio, said it had expanded its stock repurchase program by four million shares, worth about $66 million.
